languages.text: "Дар, но страшный. Вы назвали бы его оружием. Теодора желала его. Оно было ей мучительно нужно... но мы не знаем, зачем".
"A gift, but a terrible one. You would call it a weapon. Theodora coveted it. She needed it desperately... but we do not know why."
languages.original_text: "Дар, но страшный. Вы назвали бы его оружием. Теодора желала его. Оно было ей мучительно нужно... но мы не знаем, зачем".

traits.locale_text: "A gift, but a terrible one. You would call it a weapon. Theodora coveted it. She needed it desperately... but we do not know why."
"A gift, but a terrible one. You would call it a weapon. Theodora coveted it. She needed it desperately... but we do not know why."
"A gift, but a terrible one. You would call it a weapon. Theodora coveted it. She needed it desperately... but we do not know why."
"A gift, but a terrible one. You would call it a weapon. Theodora coveted it. She needed it desperately... but we do not know why."

languages.text: «Un regalo, pero un regalo terrible. Lo llamaría un arma. Theodora lo ansiaba. Lo necesitaba desesperadamente... pero no sabemos por qué».
languages.original_text: "A gift, but a terrible one. You would call it a weapon. Theodora coveted it. She needed it desperately... but we do not know why."

traits.locale_text: «Un regalo, pero un regalo terrible. Lo llamaría un arma. Theodora lo ansiaba. Lo necesitaba desesperadamente... pero no sabemos por qué».

languages.text: 「凶悪な贈り物。あなたがたなら兵器と呼ぶだろう。シオドーラは欲しがっていた。どうしても必要としていたが…なぜなのかはわからない」
languages.original_text: "A gift, but a terrible one. You would call it a weapon. Theodora coveted it. She needed it desperately... but we do not know why."

traits.locale_text: 「凶悪な贈り物。あなたがたなら兵器と呼ぶだろう。シオドーラは欲しがっていた。どうしても必要としていたが…なぜなのかはわからない」

languages.text: “那是件礼物，但却是可怕的礼物，你可以称之为武器。西奥多拉渴望得到它，她非常需要它……但我们不知道为什么。”
languages.original_text: "A gift, but a terrible one. You would call it a weapon. Theodora coveted it. She needed it desperately... but we do not know why."

traits.locale_text: “那是件礼物，但却是可怕的礼物，你可以称之为武器。西奥多拉渴望得到它，她非常需要它……但我们不知道为什么。”

languages.text: « Un présent, mais redoutable. On pourrait même parler d'une arme. Théodora la convoitait. Elle en avait désespérément besoin... mais nous ignorons pourquoi. »
languages.original_text: "A gift, but a terrible one. You would call it a weapon. Theodora coveted it. She needed it desperately... but we do not know why."

traits.locale_text: « Un présent, mais redoutable. On pourrait même parler d'une arme. Théodora la convoitait. Elle en avait désespérément besoin... mais nous ignorons pourquoi. »

languages.text: "Ein Geschenk, aber ein grauenhaftes. Ihr würdet es eine Waffe nennen. Theodora gierte danach. Sie war dringend darauf angewiesen ... doch wir wissen nicht warum."
languages.original_text: "A gift, but a terrible one. You would call it a weapon. Theodora coveted it. She needed it desperately... but we do not know why."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Geschenk, aber ein grauenhaftes. Ihr würdet es eine Waffe nennen. Theodora gierte danach. Sie war dringend darauf angewiesen ... doch wir wissen nicht warum."

languages.text: "Feci bir armağan. Bir silah da denebilir. Theodora onu çok arzuluyordu. Hatta ona muhtaçtı... Fakat sebebini bilmiyoruz."
languages.original_text: "A gift, but a terrible one. You would call it a weapon. Theodora coveted it. She needed it desperately... but we do not know why."

traits.locale_text: "Feci bir armağan. Bir silah da denebilir. Theodora onu çok arzuluyordu. Hatta ona muhtaçtı... Fakat sebebini bilmiyoruz."
